bibl.title: Ethnicity, Occupation and Tax-Status in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: Ethnic designations in demotic (and Greek) official documents from Hellenistic Egypt are generally not trustworthy indicators of real ethnicity.

bibl.title: Acta Demotica. Acts of the Fifth International Conference for Demotists. Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993

bibl.seg: LA'DA Csaba A., Ethnicity, Occupation and Tax-Status in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Acta Demotica. Acts of the Fifth International Conference for Demotists. Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993 = EVO 17 (1994) pp. 183-189.
Ethnic designations in demotic (and Greek) official documents from Hellenistic Egypt are generally not trustworthy indicators of real ethnicity.
